author: Timothy Moore
title: ASX 200 LIVE: Australian shares set to open higher on latest China stimulus hopes, RBA expected to hold cash rate steady
description: Australian shares are set to open higher. RBA decision day. Iron ore, oil, gold gain. Bitcoin stumbles. Nvidia drags Nasdaq lower. Follow updates here.

title: Bitcoin im Höhenflug: Wird die Kryptowährung das Gold des 21. Jahrhunderts?

author: Filip De Mott
title: MicroStrategy rally could push bitcoin investing at Microsoft, Amazon
description: MicroStrategy CEO Michael Saylor argued that Microsoft could add as much as $4.9 trillion to its market value by buying bitcoin.

title: Ethereum Drives Record-Breaking $3.85B Crypto Investment Inflows
description: Crypto investments hit a record $3.85B inflow last week, boosting total assets to $165B, led by Bitcoin and Ethereum's milestone surge.

title: Bitcoin Bears Take Over as Price Falls Below $100K — $114K Still Within Reach
description: The Bitcoin price has fallen below $100,000, though the wave count suggests another upward movement is likely.
